javadoc:
Class with static methods to access a hash map of icons.
 Loads the names in resources/images directory; the map is updated
 as icons are needed.

methods.javadoc:
Add the icon to the map; if name already exists, icon will
 replace the existing value.
methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Add the icon to the map; if name already exists, icon will
 replace the existing value.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the icon from the map; has no effect on the resources/images
 directory.
methods.name: remove
methods.comment:
Remove the icon from the map; has no effect on the resources/images
 directory.

methods.javadoc:
Get the icon for the given name.
@return the icon; return null if there is no icon by that name.
methods.name: get
methods.comment: Get the icon for the given name.

return.comment: the icon; return null if there is no icon by that name.

methods.javadoc: Get the sorted list of icon names the icon map.
methods.name: getIconNames
methods.comment: Get the sorted list of icon names the icon map.

name: IconMap
comment:
Class with static methods to access a hash map of icons.
 Loads the names in resources/images directory; the map is updated
 as icons are needed.
